title: FinSolve â€“ Enterprise Chatbot Platform
description: Built a secure, role-based internal chatbot and analytics platform using Streamlit and FastAPI. Supports real-time Q&A from department-tagged docs, role-based login, vector DB search, and admin dashboards.

title: AI Chatbot Application
description: Created an AI chatbot application using Streamlit for the front end and FastAPI for the backend, facilitating user interaction with advanced AI models.

title: Helmet Detection using YOLOv8
description: Developed a computer vision-based system using YOLOv8 to detect helmets on bike riders for road safety applications.

title: Ghibli Image Converter
description: Created a Python-based tool to stylize user images with Studio Ghibli-inspired themes using deep learning image transformation techniques.

title: Auto Spray Painter Machine
description: Designed and built a prototype for an automated spray painting machine using Arduino and mechanical components for uniform painting operations.
